revisionDesc.change: made basic checking changes to file

dateline.name: Baltimore and Potomac Rail Road Co.
Washington Station,

body.p: Your Welcome Letter rec. i have just come from Mr Nashs and had a good Square dinner Wish you was to tell you to come on and they would do the best they could to make your visit pleasant. i will meet you at the Depot the train gets to Wash 4:10 PM
i will Say no more until i see you
